name: ice-fang
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.
flavor_text.platinum: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.
